name: cosme-kitchen

scripts.build:server: cd server && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:server && cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:debug: npm run build && echo "===dist files===" && ls -la server/dist || true && echo "===routes===" && ls -la server/dist/routes || true

description: Monorepo with `client/` (React + Vite) and `server/` (Express + MongoDB). Run both for a full-stack app.
